sasToken.invalidPrefix: Provided token is not a SharedAccessSignature token. Please provide a valid token
sasToken.malformed: Provided SAS token is malformed. Please provide a valid token
sasToken.invalid: Provided SAS token is invalid. Please provide a valid token
sasToken.expired: Provided SAS token is expired. Please provide a valid token

iotHub.deviceNotFound: Could not find twin for device with id %s
iotHub.registryError: Failed to fetch twin from IoT Hub with error '%s'

iotCentral.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please login and then retry this action
iotCentral.genericError: IoT Central API call failed with message %s

login.description: Log in to an Azure IoT Central application

logout.description: Log out of the Azure IoT Central application by clearing the saved login token

getTwin.description: Get the IoT Hub device twin for a specific device

monitorMessages.description: Monitor messages being sent to a specific device (if device id is provided), or all devices

options.startTime: Only messages sent after start-time will be displayed. Defaults to current unix ms epoch time

config.description: Manage configuration values for the CLI

get.description: Retrieve the value for the requested configuration key

set.description: Set the specified key to the given value

list.description: List all configuration keys and values

delete.description: Delete the specified configuration key, reverting to the default value

options.raw: Return the raw machine-readable output instead of pretty-printed output. Can be specified as --no-raw, or --raw false, to turn off raw output
options.color: Allows you to turn on/off the color for output. Can be specified as --no-color, or --color false, to turn off the color.
